mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.ADMIN_NUM , b.UPLOAD_AT, b.HITS, a.ADMIN_NAME AS writer, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD b JOIN ADMIN a ON a.ADMIN_NUM = b.ADMIN_NUM WHERE b.DEL_YN = 'N'
) t WHERE RNM BETWEEN #{pageDto.start} AND #{pageDto.end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id} AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.ADMIN_NUM, b.UPLOAD_AT, b.HITS, a.ADMIN_NAME AS writer, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD b JOIN ADMIN a ON a.ADMIN_NUM = b.ADMIN_NUM WHERE b.CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id} AND b.DEL_YN = 'N'
) g WHERE RNM BETWEEN #{pageDto.start} AND #{pageDto.end}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT b.ADMIN_NUM, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.BOARD_ID, b.SEPARATION, b.UPLOAD_AT, b.HITS, b.CATEGORY_ID AS category_id, a.ADMIN_NAME AS writer FROM BOARD b JOIN ADMIN a ON a.ADMIN_NUM = b.ADMIN_NUM ) t WHERE BOARD_ID = #{BOARD_ID}
SELECT * FROM BOARD_CATEGORY ORDER BY CATEGORY_ID ASC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_ID, LEAD(BOARD_ID,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS next, LAG(BOARD_ID,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS last, TITLE, LEAD(TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS nextTitle, LAG(TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS lastTitle, UPLOAD_AT, CATEGORY_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #{category_id} ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
)k WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT BOARD_ID, LEAD(BOARD_ID,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS next, LAG(BOARD_ID,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS last, TITLE, LEAD(TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS nextTitle, LAG(TITLE,1,9999) OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_ID) AS lastTitle, UPLOAD_AT, CATEGORY_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
)k WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id}

SELECT BOARD_ID,TITLE,CONTENT,WRITER,UPLOAD_AT FROM ( SELECT b.BOARD_ID, b.TITLE, b.CONTENT, b.ADMIN_NUM , b.UPLOAD_AT, b.HITS, a.ADMIN_NAME AS writer, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.UPLOAD_AT DESC) AS RNM FROM BOARD b JOIN ADMIN a ON a.ADMIN_NUM = b.ADMIN_NUM WHERE b.DEL_YN = 'N' AND 1=1
) v WHERE RNM BETWEEN #{pageDto.start} AND #{pageDto.end}
